phrases: When did I happen to get down from that cliff?
Last night, I was looking at the moon, and then...
And then, I do not remember anything.
I need to wash my face.
I wonder if it got pulled off while I was asleep.
I do not want to do this, you know!
Why are they just after me!?
I do not taste very good!
Are not there anything to eat?
That is a picture of a vimana, from the Nemurian civilization!
It is just like the one that tried to catch me.
This is an incredibly old capsule robot.
Who is it that is there?
M- my name... is Son Gohan!
Sand will fall down here at even the slightest vibration.
Mister, what are you doing here?
That is no business of yours.
Turn off my switch and leave here at once.
There is an exit behind me.
Turn off my switch before you go.
It is no good going that way!
I cannot get down from there.
Is that any of my concern?
I told you not to turn on my switch, did not I?
I cannot get down from there!
That exit is the only one.
If you want to survive, jump down from there.
Why are you acting like such a baby?
If you stay here, you will just be buried in sand.
Turn off my switch before you go!
He left without turning off my switch.
I am just wasting my energy like this.
Mister, your visual sensors are damaged, huh?
I will fix them for you.
I do not need visual sensors any more!
There is no point in you doing this.
Hmm, you are still a child, are not you?
I am surprised that someone like you would be in a dangerous place like this.
There is no way I could jump down from that place, you see?
Unless you want to die here, you should be able to.
But Mister, if you would just cooperate with me!
And do not turn on my switch again.
Now, turn off my switch, and then get out of here.
Hurry now, turn off my switch.
Is it okay if I eat all of this?
I can still eat more and more!
I told you not to wake me.
There is bound to be one or two scorpions around.
Do not make me say the same thing over and over.
I wonder if I can eat these clouds.
Do not turn on my switch over such trivial things!
There is no reason for there to be anything to eat here, is there?
Scorpions and snakes are about all the things you can eat around here.
Do not use such a loud voice!
A- all right, but just this once.
At this time of year, inside this cave...
Go search all the deeper corners.
I found some, I found some!
Then you do not need me anymore, right?
But I cannot eat these raw.
You will not be able to survive in these plains like that.
Mister, you have a cooking system, huh?
I read so in a robot picture book.
You are a 3-S type all-purpose capsule robot C-6, right Mister?
It says in my picture book that you are quite a superior robot.
Shall I fry those up for you?
What kind of flavor do you want?
How should I know what that is?
Am I to blame for that as well?
How is it that you are in this sort of place?
I want to go back to my mother's place,
but I do not know what I should do.
It is not possible for a little kid like you to cross the desert.
Having said that, it will be even harder for you to live in this desert.
Mister, what is it that brought you here?
It was an investigation into excavating these ruins.
No sooner had I found this place than, hmm, I ended up like this.
The ground around here is not very firm, so earthquakes are constantly occurring.
I have been here in the sand ever since.
This Nemurian temple was a great discovery, was not it?
How do you know about that?
It said so in a picture book.
Anyhow, there might be someone else
who comes searching the area that helps us out, huh?
It is been eighty years now since I have been buried in the sand.
I am going... to get you... out of here, Mister!
I want to stay with this city!
You can leave here together with me!
I can store up energy and leap out of here all at once.
You do not want to die, do you?
You come with me too, Mister!
I am a superior 3-S type, after all.
Do not because me any more trouble!
Now, summon up your courage and jump with all your might.
I have to turn off your switch!
It appears you are okay, right?
Open up my head and connect the blue wire to the red wire.
If you do not hurry, the ceiling is going to come down!
Dammit, my energy is beginning to leak out...
But it appears that my energy is all used up.
Never mind about that, hurry up and go on.
Do not cry, even when you are all alone.
You cannot rely on anyone else around here if you are going to survive.
Goku and Gohan - what sort of adventures await them next?
The Saiyans are closing in with every passing moment!
